title: [Self-Directed] Game-Based Job Interview Simulation: Competency Enhancement for Real-World Preparation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic self-introduction skills and possession of job-related knowledge
context.additional_context: Provides a real-time interview practice environment combining AI digital human interviewers with game elements

learning_goals: Learners achieve an 80% or higher response rate to core interview questions from various professions (design, engineering, development).
Learners correct two or more nonverbal communication errors (facial expressions, vocal tone) through game-based feedback.
Learners establish three personalized interview strategies based on AI simulation evaluation reports.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
